page.title: 08BUILDINGS
page.content: Given below is information on some of the buildings in the block.{NAME AGE {FUNCTION (P=Private, F=FARM) MATERIALS Sid Valley Farm 17th Hotel Stone; Plyford Farm 17th Flint thatch; Pin Hill Cottage 19th P Stone; Pin Hill Farm 18th Flint; Wolversleigh Farm 17th flint; Lincombe Farm 1610 Cob thatch; Mouseplat 18-19th P brick Dutch tile hanging; Sandcombe Farm 1702 brick flint; Lower Mincombe Farm 18-19th flint; Lower Knapp Farm 18th flint; Penn Coombe c1930 P brick; Pit Orchard c1930 P brick; Shatterway c1930 P brick; Sea Hill c1930 P brick; Knapplands c1980 P brick; Higher Knapp Farm 18th&c1930 Bed & Breakfast, Caravan site, store,F brick; Shepherds Croft 19th P flint;
